news.headline: Instil Bio Announces Effective Date of 1-for-20 Reverse Stock Split
news.summary: DALLAS, Dec. 05, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Instil Bio, Inc. (“Instil” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: TIL), a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on developing tumor infiltrating lymphocyte, or TIL, therapies for the treatment of patients with cancer, today announced that a 1-for-20 reverse stock split of its outstanding shares of common stock will be effective as of 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time on Thursday, December 7, 2023.
